sentences: Unique Torralba Salonga, known mononymously as Unique, stylized as UNIQUE, (born April 26, 2000) is a Filipino musician and singer-songwriter.
In June 2014, Allan Silonga decided to form a band for his son Blaster, who would become the band's lead guitarist.
On May 4, 2018, Unique Salonga left IV of Spades in order to pursue a solo career.
In 2018, Salonga released his debut single, Midnight Sky, under the label of O/C Records of VIVA.
In the same year, Salonga released his debut album, Grandma, and his first solo concert was held on September 29, 2018.
